title: are Rune pages no longer for sale in the store?
body: Cause I don't see them offered anywhere.  I clicked through all the tabs 3 or 4 times.  I paid particular attention to the Gameplay tab because that is where the actual runes are, but no rune page is available there.  What's up?

replies.body:
They in the gameplay tab, you just have to ensure your sorting on the left under **tier** is set to *Show All*, as shown in the screenshot.

(Click to enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

Let me know if this helped, friend. ^_^
